document.full_text: a 91-year-old freshman republican state representative suggested that new hampshire?s mentally disabled be shipped to siberia and said he was unapologetic about the comment.
document.title: new england: new hampshire: lawmaker suggests siberia for disabled
lines_and_colors: a 91-year-old freshman republican state representative suggested that new hampshire?s mentally disabled be shipped to siberia and said he was unapologetic about the comment.
